channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Hardening – Fix Your WordPress Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Hardening – Fix Your WordPress Security

item.title: CVE-2021-24372|2024-08-03T19:28:23.783Z -- unknown -- wp%20hardening%20%E2%80%93%20fix%20your%20wordpress%20security
item.description: The WP Hardening – Fix Your WordPress Security WordPress plugin before 1.2.2 did not sanitise or escape the $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] before outputting it in an attribute, leading to a reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue.

item.title: CVE-2021-24373|2024-08-03T19:28:23.763Z -- unknown -- wp%20hardening%20%E2%80%93%20fix%20your%20wordpress%20security
item.description: The WP Hardening – Fix Your WordPress Security WordPress plugin before 1.2.2 did not sanitise or escape the historyvalue GET parameter before outputting it in a Javascript block, leading to a reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue.
